Summary: Pets crave it, overall worked well for allergic dogs
text: I must confess that I have two pugs, so you can take what I am about to say with a grain of salt ... yes, they crave this food (but yes, they crave just about anything!).  They tend to have bad food allergies, and this food has kept them relatively allergy-free (so it is a nice alternative to the very expensive specialty foods that are out there).  Overall the ingredients and quality of the food seems to be great, the animals are happy, and so I declare the food a winner.  Recommended!
